name: Cloud Knight Lieutenant: Yanqing (Complete)
description: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is General Jing Yuan's retainer, a gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age.

skills.name: Rapturous Wind
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. Yanqing and all Flying Swords gain 1 stack of Chilling Light and slightly increases DMG dealt.

skills.name: Swallow Return
skills.description: Summons 4 Flying Swords and gains the Sword Formation effect to increase this unit's SPD, and applies Formation Core to the Flying Swords. During this unit's third phase, additionally grant Ordeal to a certain number of Flying Swords.

skills.name: Ironthorn
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Ballad of Formation Breaker
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Qi Advance
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Cast Cascading Laceration on all targets in the next action.

skills.name: Cascading Laceration
skills.description: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Qi Converge
skills.description: Locks on to a single target. After 2 turns, use Aethereal Dreamflux on the target.

skills.name: Aethereal Dreamflux
skills.description: Continuously deals Ice DMG to a target. After using this ability, additionally deals DMG for a number of times equal to the number of Flying Swords on the field. After using this ability, remove all Flying Swords on the field.
